member.name: M:Nca.Valdr.IParser.Parse(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String,Nca.Valdr.ValdrTypeAttributeDescriptor,System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Parses classes from assemblies provided into valdr constraint metadata.
member.param: Culture to use when resolving validation messages from resources.
String to filter namespaces checked - if provided, only namespaces starting with the filter string will be considered.
Description of attribute used to identify ValdrType classes. NOTE: attributes used here MUST use named arguments to be picked up correctly by parser
Name of attribute used to identify DataMembers (optional). NOTE: attributes MUST use named arguments to be picked up correctly by parser
Assemblies to parse for models needing valdr constraints.
